org.svvrl.goal.core.aut
Class AbstractNGBWLikeAcc

java.lang.Object
  org.svvrl.goal.core.AbstractEditable
      org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.AutomatonComponent
          org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.Acc<StateRun>
              org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.AbstractNGBWLikeAcc
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.EventListener, SetListener<State>, Editable
Direct Known Subclasses:
GeneralizedBuchiAcc, MullerAcc, ParityAcc
public abstract class AbstractNGBWLikeAcc
extends Acc<StateRun>
implements SetListener<State>

This is a category of acceptance conditions. Each acceptance condition is a set {F1, F2, ..., Fn} where each Fi is a set of states (acceptance sets). Generalized Büchi condition, Muller condition, and parity condition belong to this category. Note that the parity condition still requires that (1) it contains all automaton states and (2) every automaton state only appears in one Fi. The two requirements are not guaranteed by this class.

Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai
See Also:
Serialized Form

setVisible

protected void setVisible(GraphicComponent c,
                          boolean b)
Description copied from class: Acc
Makes a component visible or invisible in this acceptance condition. The effect is the same as removing the component from this acceptance condition but the removal can be recovered.

Specified by:
setVisible in class Acc<StateRun>
Parameters:
c - a component
